text: For those interested in getting more women involved in the booming sector of tech and transportation, there's an event this evening in SF at @KeepTruckinInc
author: peteleyden

text: A startup I've been tracking for some time, @CoverUSHealth, is working to help people protect and profit from their health data, has an equity crowdfunding round open to investors for as little as $100 for the next week– consider supporting them!
author: peteleyden

text: Wow. Quite a feat. A former conservative neo-con pulls together all the threads in one concise column about: The GOP’s declaration of moral bankruptcy
author: peteleyden

text: Live from the Mission in San Francisco on this late winter day. The future looks more promising from this vantage point. The California Way Forward. – bei Mission Dolores Park
author: peteleyden

text: Really terrific conversation last night on the 3 simultaneous revolutions in transport to shared, electric and autonomous. Super important to tune into these developments now.
author: peteleyden
